#summary Переключение между окнами по Alt-Цифра

= Описание =


= Текст =

{{{
macro
  Descr="Use Alt-Digit to switch between screens"
  Bind="Alt1 Alt2 Alt3 Alt4 Alt5 Alt6 Alt7 Alt8 Alt9 Alt0 Alt`"
  Area="Shell Editor Viewer"
{{
//%s = Key(#AKey);
  %s = AKey(1);
  $if (%s == "Alt`")
    %c = "0";
  $else
    %c = substr(%s, len(%s) - 1, 1);
  $end
  F12
  $If (CheckHotkey (%c))
    eval(%c)
  $Else
    Esc
    Beep()
  $End
}}
}}}
